meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Diana Peloquin Julie Hornick Arthur Chu Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #6793.

td.p: Diana Peloquin, a graduate student of law and social work from Ann Arbor, Michigan
Julie Hornick, a middle school librarian from Summerville, South Carolina
Arthur Chu, a compliance analyst and voiceover artist from Broadview Heights, Ohio (whose 11-day cash winnings total $297,200)

tr.td: INSPIRED CHARACTERS
RHYME TREBEK, TREBEK!
IT ALWAYS HAPPENS IN "THREE"S
CEO COMPENSATION
(Alex: ...according to 2012 figures from Forbes.)
TOO BAD
SO SAD

toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'the Great Gatsby

Arthur
')

Julie

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Arthur
Julie
Diana
MEDICAL PROBLEMS
ITALIAN ADJECTIVES
(Alex: ...and you have to translate the Italian adjective into English.)
PHILOSOPHY
ON THE "M"AP
NATIVE AMERICANS
NEW ENTERTAINMENT AWARDS?
(Alex: They sound like the Emmy, the Grammy, the Tony--I hope you get the idea.)

div.onmouseover:

(Julie: A postiori? [Long E sound for the second "I"])
...

empirical or a posteriori

ArthurJulie
Triple Stumper
')

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

tr.td: Arthur
Julie
Diana

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: His older brother had been Prince of Wales but did something really weird.)
...
(Alex: [To Diana] His brother Edward is the one who abdicated.)
...
(Alex: $15,700 as our new champion is crowned, Diana; and Arthur, you\'re going away with just a little shade under $300,000. A great run--we\'ll see you in our Tournament of Champions.)
ArthurWho was George II?
$6,400
JulieWho was George V?
$5,100
DianaWho is George VI?
$3,600
George VI')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'He was the last male monarch who had not previously been Prince of Wales')

tr.td: BRITISH ROYALTY
He was the last male monarch who had not previously been Prince of Wales
Arthur
Julie
Diana
3rd place: $1,000
2nd place: $2,000
New champion: $15,700
Arthur
Julie
Diana

23 R,
6 W
(including 1 DD)

13 R
(including 2 DDs),
1 W

body.div: The J! Archive is created by fans, for fans. The Jeopardy! game show and all elements thereof, including but not limited to copyright and trademark thereto, are the property of Jeopardy Productions, Inc. and are protected under law. This website is not affiliated with, sponsored by, or operated by Jeopardy Productions, Inc. Join the discussion at JBoard.tv.
